definition: to play (a card)/to make a move in a game
to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: His team is pretty much run-and-gun.
sentences.chinese: 他的球队更多的是跑轰打法。

sentences.english: Now I try to play strong but without the fouls .
sentences.chinese: 现在我正尝试没有犯规的强硬打法。

sentences.english: Simply keep practicing the Windsor Knot a few more times until you can tie this necktie knot within less than two minutes.
sentences.chinese: 你可以多练练温莎结的打法，争取两分钟就能搞定它。

sentences.english: I love the responsibility of defending and attacking.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢球队全攻全守的打法。

sentences.english: Their deadly style has earned them respect from other martial artists.
sentences.chinese: 他们致命的打法为他们博得其它武术家的尊敬。

sentences.english: You might also want to bring some old-fashioned meat shields.
sentences.chinese: 你可能也会想用老式的肉盾生物打法。

sentences.english: The curve ball is also called arc line ball.
This play is better than calling his flop bet.
sentences.chinese: 这种打法比跟注他在翻牌圈的下注要好。

sentences.english: Sweden should be well aware of the threat from Klose who looks one of the form strikers going into the last 16.
sentences.chinese: 瑞典人应当小心克洛斯，十六强中打法典型的前锋。

sentences.english: Brazil coach Denga has highlighted the Netherlands' rapid counter-attacks.
sentences.chinese: 巴西主帅邓加特意强调了荷兰快速反击的打法。

sentences.english: No one build will win you a game every time.
sentences.chinese: 你不能每次都通过一个打法或单位来获取胜利。

sentences.english: The kind of play that he has.
sentences.chinese: 比如关于他的打法什么的。

sentences.english: He mostly used the method of the big curve, whose angle of striking can reach six degrees.
sentences.chinese: 他大都是采用入位角度达6度的大曲球打法。

sentences.english: But you always know what to expect when you play against him.
sentences.chinese: 但是你总是预计到他的打法。

sentences.english: I have hatched up a plan to deal with his playing way.
sentences.chinese: 我已想出了一套对付他打法的方案。

definition: formation (of a sports team, troops etc)
to attack/to assault/to go on the offensive/attack/assault/offense (sports)
troop arrangement/battle formation/lineup (of a sports team etc)
to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from
(coll.) to take a taxi/to go by taxi
member of same class, team, work group etc/teammate
